com.cognifide.qa.bb.config

Class YamlConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.config.YamlConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStrategy

    public class YamlConfig
extends Object
implements ConfigStrategy
    Provides configuration strategy that loads Bobcat properties from a YAML file. The 'new' Bobcat configuration strategy, it replaces the LegacyConfig.
    At the moment, to enable this config, Bobcat users needs to run tests with "bobcat.config" system property set to yaml.

    YAML configuration files should follow this format: 
     

 default:
   properties:
    # default properties
   contexts: [context1, context2 # list of context to be loaded by default
 contexts:
   context1:
     prop1: value1
     prop2: value2
     # ...
   context2:
     propr1: value3
     # ...
   # ...
 }
    Since:
    1.4.0
